name: Removing direct photocurrent artifacts in optogenetic connectivity mapping data
citation: Antin, Benjamin (2024) Removing direct photocurrent artifacts in optogenetic connectivity mapping data (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/000969/draft
description: Datasets to replicate results for the paper "Removing direct photocurrent artifacts in optogenetic connectivity mapping data" by Antin, Sadahiro et al. Corresponding code is available at https://github.com/bantin/phorc.
